attributes.action: End the 14 day quarantine for people coming from Spain.
attributes.additional_details: Let’s not forget the millions of people going on holiday which they have had to cancel because they can’t self isolate.
attributes.background: The Government need to end the Self Quarantine for people coming to Spain because thousands of people are currently stuck in Spain and will have to Isolate but they might not have the money to Isolate. I think it is a stupid thing to do.
